mission.posting: We've recieved word that Macrosoft has a port crusher in one of its servers. We want you to retrieve it.

email.subject: The Thief Strikes Back
email.body:
It's time to return to Macrosoft. We've recieved word from a reliable source that Macrosoft has a new port crusher that we wish to acquire. Scout around and find the port crusher. Once you find it, upload it to the drop server.
-Z3r0
